title: Ping problems
body: For past 2 days i have hard time in game trying to stay connected ping has been bouncing from low 50s to in the thousands ... this is the only game i have been having problems with how do i fix this

replies.body:
Wow if that ping is spiking up into the thousands your network may be having some problems keeping a stable connection to the game server you were playing on. Sometimes we can adjust a few network settings to iron that out, but it almost sounds like you're dealing with some packet loss.

Check out our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and use it to analyze your most recent game logs. If you can take a screenshot using something like Gyazo or Imgur and post it here, I can see what's going on and point you in the right direction then.
